pages.title: Jade Vines
pages.text: The remaining energy of this plant from aeons ago is barely still perceptible. So light and vulnerable that you think any wrong move could breathe the last bit of life out of your fragile bulb.$(br2)$(italic)Will the history of this plant remain elusive to you forever?

pages.title: Germinating
pages.text: Once almost a lost cause you now have an ace up your sleeve:$(br)With the help of the $(l:creating_life/spirit_instiller)Spirit Instiller$(/l) you are sure that you can breathe life back into the little bulb.

pages.title: Planting & Growing
pages.text: Palid, fragile but beautiful hanging plants, twining down wooden fences.$(br)$(c_red)Not used to the intense light after all these aeons, they will die when exposed to too much sunlight.$(br)$(c_lime)They only grow one stage per night and only when exposed to the way more soft, indirect light of the moon.

pages.title: Jade Jelly
pages.text: As you exposed one of the plants to strong sunlight, you found that it withered. Not only did this withered shrub leave you with new Bulbs, but also this gel-like jelly.$(br2)$(italic)Unexpectedly tasty$().

pages.title: Jaramel
pages.text: If the Jade Jelly is heated blazingly fast and then cooled down again, the result is a very viscous but sugar-sweet mass.$(br2)$(italic)Fancy a sugar rush?

pages.title: Petals
pages.text: Shiny petals can be plucked when partly grown.$(br)They can be used as $(l:decoration/jade_vine_petal_blocks)decoration$().$(br)Rarely, when searching the petals, $(thing)another Bulb$() can be found.(br)How will Jade Vines look when you let them grow further?

pages.title: Moonstruck Nectar
pages.text: After many nights on a full moon, the plants reach full bloom. The nectar that they collect in their blossoms can be harvested with a Glass Bottle.$(br)Bears great restorative properties:$(li)can be drunk for healing$(li)able to repair any damaged item$().
这种植物从远古时代遗留下来的能量现在还几乎看不到。如此轻和脆弱，以至于你认为任何错误的举动都可能让你脆弱的鳞茎失去最后一点生命。$(br2)$(italic)这种植物的历史会永远让你难以捉摸吗？
pages.title: 古玉藤树

pages.text: 曾经几乎是一项失败的事业，现在你有了一张王牌：$(br)在$(l:creating_life/spirit_instiller)灵魂注入器$(/l)的帮助下，你确信你可以将生命重新注入这个小鳞茎。
pages.title: 发芽

pages.text: 栅栏，脆弱但美丽的悬挂植物，缠绕着木质栅栏。$(br)$(c_red)经历了这么多年，它们还不习惯强光，直接暴露在阳光下会死去。$(br)$(c_lime)它们每晚只生长一个阶段，并且只有当暴露在更柔和的、间接的月球光下时。
pages.title: 种植和生长

pages.text: 当你不小心把其中一株植物放在强烈的阳光下，你发现它枯萎了。这种枯萎的灌木不仅给你留下了新的鳞茎，还留下了这种凝胶状的果冻。$(br)$(italic)出人意料的美味。$()
pages.title: 玉质果冻

pages.text: 有光泽的花瓣在部分生长时可以小心地采摘。$(br)这些花瓣可以用来$(l:decoration/jade_vine_petal_blocks)装饰$()。$(br)很少，当搜索花瓣时，可以找到另一个鳞茎。
pages.title: 花瓣

pages.text: 在满月的许多夜晚之后，植物达到了盛开。$(br)$(italic)他们在花中收集的花蜜可以用玻璃瓶采集。有很好的恢复作用，可以喝掉来治疗。$()
pages.title: 月相花蜜
